mapper.select: select f.id, f.uid, f.friend_id, f.group_id, f.remark_name, f.star_flag, f.create_time, f.update_time, f.create_by, f.modify_by, f.status, f.is_delete, f.tenant_id, pu.username, pu.nickname, pui.name, pui.avatar, pui.intro from im_user_friend f join pt_user pu on f.uid = pu.id left join pt_user_info pui on f.uid = pui.uid where f.uid = #{uid};
